name: Procedure: How to Bake a Cake
description: This procedure outlines the steps for baking a delicious and fluffy cake.

steps.description: In a large bowl, combine 1 cup (2 sticks) of softened butter and 1 3/4 cups of granulated sugar.
Beat the mixture until light and fluffy, about 2 minutes.
Add 3 eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
In a separate bowl, combine 2 1/4 cups of all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon of baking powder, and 1/2 teaspoon of salt.
warnings: Make sure the baking powder is fresh, as old baking powder can cause the cake to fall.

steps.description: Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined.
tips: Do not overmix the batter, as this can make the cake tough.

steps.description: Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch round cake pan.
Bake in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Let the cake cool completely before frosting.

safetyPrecautions: Use caution when working with hot oven and sharp objects.
Ensure proper ventilation when using the oven to prevent the buildup of harmful fumes.
author: Jane Doe
